REQUESTERROR.heading: Requesterror
REQUESTERROR.text: It seems like your request didn't get through correctly or that some parts of it weren't correct.

NOTEXISTENTARTICLE.heading: Nonexistent
NOTEXISTENTARTICLE.text: It seems like you are trying to access an article that no longer exists.

PERMISSIONERROR.heading: Not allowed
PERMISSIONERROR.text: It seems like you are trying to access a page that you do not have sufficient permission to acces. If you believe that is an error, please submit a report.

TIMEOUTERROR.heading: Timeout
TIMEOUTERROR.text: You are not allowed to write more articles / comments as you are currently under Timeout. Please wait a bit and try again.

LOCKEDERROR.heading: Locked
LOCKEDERROR.text: Your account is currently locked so you cant write any articles / comments. If you believe this is and error please submit a report detailing your problems. Possible reasons for your accont getting locked are spam and or malicious articles.

FORMERROR.heading: Formerror
FORMERROR.text: It seems like you submitted a Form with insufficient Details. Please go back and  assure you got all required points.

LOGINERROR.heading: Loginerror
LOGINERROR.text: An error occurred whilst trying to log you in. Please try again. If this keeps happening, please submit a report.

CODEERROR.heading: Wrong Code
CODEERROR.text: It seems like your code does not work. Please assure that it is correct. If it still doesn't work, submit a report.

PASSWORDERROR.heading: Passworderror
PASSWORDERROR.text: It seems like something is wrong with your entered passwords. Please take an extra look that they are the same.

CREATIONERROR.heading: Creationerror
CREATIONERROR.text: It seems like the account could not be created from the server side. Please submit a report about this and ask for another code.
